name: Pumpkin Panic
description:
Pumpkin Panic The winning submission to our 1st Game Jam of the 2019/20 Academic Year

A word by one of the team's artists:

"We had around 24 hours to produce a game under the themes of 'horde' and 'artefact'. Our game was a couch coop where the players competed as farmers to defend themselves against a horde of evil pumpkins attacked their farm (with a Halloween theme of course, seeing as it is nearly that time of year!)." - Faye Meadows
